Player History
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (M) on 7/26/1988 (Going to LAD: P Roger McDowell. Going to NYM: CF John Vander Wal, RF Cecil Espy)...
Injured on 7/10/1989 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/11/1990, off Dave Righetti (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/17/1990, off Brent Gaff (STL)...
